Package com.atakmap.map.layer.feature.style

Class BasicStrokeStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.map.layer.feature.style.Style
      • com.atakmap.map.layer.feature.style.BasicStrokeStyle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Disposable
    public final class BasicStrokeStyle
extends Style
    Basic style for linestring geometry. Defines stroke width and color.
